00049 const char cwwwstatmod::_id[] = "wwwstat";
00050 const char cwwwstatmod::_conf[] = ""; 
00051 const char cwwwstatmod::_name[] = "wwwstat";
00052 const char cwwwstatmod::_menu[] = "<wwwstat/>";

00057 cwwwstatmod::cwwwstatmod(cenvironment & env) : cmod(env) {
00058     modinfo = mi_menu;
00059 }
00060 
00064 void cwwwstatmod::item_dump( const string & pre ) {
00065     out<<"<item prefix=\""<< pre << "\"/>";
00066     if(! domains.empty()) domains += ',';
00067     if( ! pre.empty() ) {
00068             domains += pre;
00069             domains += '.';
00070     }
00071     domains += domain;
00072     empty = false;
00073 }
00074 
00075 /***************************************************************************
00076  * 
00077  * *************************************************************************/
00078 void cwwwstatmod::act() {
00079   vector<cinfodb::wwwali_dom_info> wadis;
00080   vector<cinfodb::wwwali_dom_info>::size_type cnt, i;
00081 
00082   if( !idb->wwwali_ls(sessb.ai.dom, wadis) && wadis.size() ) {
00083     cnt = wadis.size();
00084     if( ! cnt ) {
00085       out<< "<noent/>"; return;
00086     }
00087     for( i=0; i < cnt; i++ ) {
00088       domain = wadis[i].domain;
00089       out<<"<dom name=\""<< wadis[i].domain <<"\">";
00090       item_dump( "" );
00091       act_dom(wadis[i].id);
00092       out<<"</dom>";
00093     }
00094   } else out<< "<getcant/>";
00095 }
00099 void cwwwstatmod::act_user() {
00100   cinfodb::ftp_info fi;
00101   fi.user = sessb.ai.user;
00102   switch(idb->ftp_get(sessb.ai.dom, fi)) {
00103   case cinfodb::err_noent: out<<"<noent/>"; return;
00104   case cinfodb::err_no: break;
00105   default: out<<"<getcant/>"; return;
00106   }
00107 
00108   if( fi.dir.empty() ) {
00109     out<<"<noent/>"; return;
00110   }
00111 
00112   vector<cinfodb::wwwali_dom_info> wadis;
00113   vector<cinfodb::wwwali_dom_info>::size_type cnt, i;
00114 
00115   if( !idb->wwwali_ls(sessb.ai.dom, wadis) && wadis.size() ) {
00116     cnt = wadis.size();
00117     if( ! cnt ) {
00118       out<<"<noent/>"; return;
00119     }
00120     for( i=0; i < cnt; i++ ) {
00121       domain = wadis[i].domain;
00122       out<<"<dom name=\""<< wadis[i].domain <<"\">";
00123       if( fi.dir == "/" ) item_dump("");
00124       act_dom_dir(wadis[i].id, fi.dir);
00125       out<<"</dom>";
00126     }
00127   } else out<< "<getcant/>";
00128 }
00129 
00133 void cwwwstatmod::act_dom_dir(const string &domid, const string &dir) {
00134   vector<cinfodb::wwwali_info> wais;
00135   vector<cinfodb::wwwali_info>::size_type cnt, i;
00136   if( ! idb->wwwali_dom_ls_dir( domid, dir, wais ) ) {
00137     cnt = wais.size();
00138     if( ! cnt ) {
00139       out<<"<noent/>";
00140       return;
00141     }
00142     for( i=0; i<cnt; ++i )
00143       item_dump( wais[i].prefix );
00144   } else out<< "<getcant/>";
00145 }
00149 void cwwwstatmod::act_dom( const string & di ) {
00150  vector<cinfodb::wwwali_info> wais;
00151  vector<cinfodb::wwwali_info>::size_type cnt, i;
00152 
00153  if( ! idb->wwwali_dom_ls( di, wais ) ) {
00154    cnt = wais.size();
00155    if( ! cnt ) {
00156      out<<"<noent/>";
00157      return;
00158    }
00159    for( i=0; i<cnt; ++i )
00160      item_dump( wais[i].prefix );
00161  } else out<< "<getcant/>";
00162 }
00163 /**************************************************************************
00164  *  
00165  *  ***********************************************************************/
00166 char cwwwstatmod::run() {
00167   cgicc::const_form_iterator fi = cgi.getElement("id");
00168   if( fi != env.cgi_end_get() && fi->getValue() == _id ) {
00169     idb.reset(cinfodb::alloc());
00170 
00171     domains = "";
00172     empty = true;
00173     out<< "<mod><wwwstat sid=\"" << env.sess_get().getid() <<"\">";
00174     
00175     if ( sessb.ai.flags & cvq::admin ) act();
00176     else act_user();
00177     
00178     if( empty ) out<< "<noent/>";
00179     out<< "</wwwstat></mod>";
00180     env.sess_get().setval("stat_domains", domains);
00181     return done;
00182   }
00183   return notme;
00184 }
